actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to grant discretion to the Administrator to administer garage and parking appropriations and fees as a revolving fund.

summary.text: Permits the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to administer medical facility garage and parking appropriations and fees as a revolving fund. (Under current law, the Administrator is required to administer such amounts as a revolving fund.)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to grant discretion to the Administrator to administer garage and parking appropriations and fees as a revolving fund.
